title: Handkerchief, 19th century
description: Handkerchief in piña cloth with scalloped edge, buttonholed and with border of flowering vine, embroidered in cotton, crossing circles of drawnwork. Corner in black and white with word: Recuerdos with bird above and small dog or cat below flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique:. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-77.
